dcterms:description: UCF50 dataset consists of 50 action categories that consist of realistic videos taken from YouTube. The dataset is challenging due to significant variations in camera motion, object appearance and pose, viewpoint, object scale, cluttered background, and lighting conditions. Some of the actions included are diving, walking with a dog, jump rope, and horse riding.
dcterms:title: UCF50

dcterms:description: The dataset created by the authors consists of 3 basic activities - walking, sitting, and jumping. It includes videos showcasing friends or family performing the actions, as well as videos taken from YouTube and free stock video clip websites. The dataset primarily features Indian faces, with each action category including 21 videos ranging from 3 to 15 seconds in duration.
dcterms:title: Dataset created by the authors
